- hits and runs in groups.
- alternates between regenerating and attacking.* appears only in Sheol. |                                                                        |

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"Fill in gaps on table"*

The **chillbug** is a monster added in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack") that is normally generated only in the [Sheol](/wiki/Sheol "Sheol") branch. When not currently attacking, chillbugs regenerate health very quickly.

Chillbugs also appear in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), where they have a single 6d5 [cold](/wiki/Cold "Cold") bite attack and can randomly appear anywhere.

## Strategy

Chillbugs can hit moderately hard, but by the time you reach Sheol they should be manageable. Just try not to get surrounded by the groups that they generate in.

## Encyclopedia entry

Chillbugs are insects that are native residents of Sheol. They are said to be composed of liquid ice. Their ability to quickly regenerate has puzzled many humans and non-humans alike.  
  
Chillbugs are cool.
html:
Chillbug

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
x chillbug (No tile)
Difficulty ?
Attacks Bite 6d5 physical, bite 6d5
x chillbug (No tile)
Difficulty ?
Attacks

Bite 6d5 physical, bite 6d5

Base level 10
Base experience ?
Speed 12
Base AC 0
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 4 (Uncommon)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 400
Nutritional value 400
Size Small
Resistances cold, poison, acid
Resistances conveyed None

A chillbug:

  • can fly.
  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • normally appears in large groups.
  • hits and runs in groups.
  • alternates between regenerating and attacking.
  • appears only in Sheol.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"Fill in gaps on table"

The chillbug is a monster added in UnNetHack that is normally generated only in the Sheol branch. When not currently attacking, chillbugs regenerate health very quickly.

Chillbugs also appear in SlashTHEM, where they have a single 6d5 cold bite attack and can randomly appear anywhere.

Strategy

Chillbugs can hit moderately hard, but by the time you reach Sheol they should be manageable. Just try not to get surrounded by the groups that they generate in.

Encyclopedia entry

Chillbugs are insects that are native residents of Sheol. They are said to be composed of liquid ice. Their ability to quickly regenerate has puzzled many humans and non-humans alike.

Chillbugs are cool.

The '''chillbug''' is a monster added in [[UnNetHack]] that is normally generated only in the [[Sheol]] branch. When not currently attacking, chillbugs regenerate health very quickly. 

Chillbugs also appear in [[SlashTHEM]], where they have a single 6d5 [[cold]] bite attack and can randomly appear anywhere.

==Strategy==
Chillbugs can hit moderately hard, but by the time you reach Sheol they should be manageable. Just try not to get surrounded by the groups that they generate in.

==Encyclopedia entry==
{{encyclopedia|
Chillbugs are insects that are native residents of Sheol.  They are said to be composed of liquid ice.  Their ability to quickly regenerate has puzzled many humans and non-humans alike.

Chillbugs are cool.
}}
